name: luam-candles
description: Luam Candles - Sitio web de velas artesanales

scripts.build: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path dist) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist }; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Name dist; Copy-Item proyectofinal.github.io-main/index.html dist/; Copy-Item -Recurse proyectofinal.github.io-main/assets dist/; Copy-Item -Recurse proyectofinal.github.io-main/images dist/; Copy-Item -Recurse proyectofinal.github.io-main/videos dist/"

author: Luam Candles
